text: Celeste Olalquiaga is a Venezuelan-born independent scholar. She is the author of The Artificial Kingdom: A Treasury of the Kitsch Experience and Megalopolis: Contemporary Cultural Sensibilities. She received a grant from the Rockefeller Foundation in 1994 and a Guggenheim Fellowship in 1996. She writes the column "Object Lesson" for the publication Cabinet. ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Venezuelan women writers Category:Rockefeller Fellows Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Celeste Olalquiaga
